org.bonitasoft.engine.bpm.contract

Interface ContractDefinition

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BonitaObject, InputContainerDefinition, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ContractDefinitionImpl

    public interface ContractDefinition
extends InputContainerDefinition
    A ContractDefinition defines what the UserTaskInstance needs to be executed, or the Process to be started.

    A ContractDefinition is part of a UserTaskDefinition or a of the ProcessDefinition

    Since:
    7.0
    Author:
    Matthieu Chaffotte
